item.title: About
item.author: Sookjin Hyun
item.description:
Work Life

I am a software engineer, mostly develope enterprise solutions for companies to makes their business easier, productive and successful. Specialized in CRM, Data Integration. Sprucing up web skills in my leisure.

Personal Life

The theme of my life is simple life. I believe clarity is the key to be strong. As a minimalists, I am into things make my life simple and smart. I am quite introvert, whereas very active, so I still call myself an adventurer. I love nature and outdoors, also enjoy challenge makes me feel alive.

item.title: About
item.author: Sookjin Hyun
item.description:
About me

I am a software developer, mostly build enterprise solutions for companies to makes their business easier, productive and successful. Specialized in CRM, Data Integration. Sprucing up web skills in my leisure.

As a minimalists, I am living my simple lifestyle. I believe in Owning less, Living more, Clarity is my key to be mentally strong. I am very introvert, enjoying quiet time to think and write, whereas very active, enjoying nature and outdoor lifestyle; bike, bushwalking, camping etc. I am learner an adventurer, enjoy challenges make me feel alive.

About site

This is my personal web site, there is no menu here, meaning you can’t browse the archive by any chance,it can be found only with links provided. And all the contents except this page in this site are in Korean. This site is powered by Hugo.

Contact

sookjin at gmail dot com
